issue.title: Adguard block the countdown timer for sonixgvn.net
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version 5.0.128 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc. ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox, Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://sonixgvn.net/dark/?aHR0cHM6Ly9yaW5rdS5tZS9scmlubkxL ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Hi So, I want to open the [URL](https://sonixgvn.net/the-idolmaster-million-movement-of-stardom-road-03-hypernova/) and click the blue box provided. But, it seems the supposed countdown timer to proceed to the external site is disappeared unless I disabled the extension. What do you think? 2. Screenshots

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
